Dialogues.Text: Oh! Good to see another face around here. Seems like everybody's off doing... something or another. Its just Seamstress and I here now. It's... a tad unsettling, to be honest. This place is usually quite full of life.
I can't say I'm entirely sure... The Orator called some sort of meeting upstairs for every Bishop and Devotee present at the time.
I could hear everyone's voices clamoring above me, and then, suddenly, there was a loud sort of roar. Everyone went silent, and then... that was it.

I haven't seen a soul besides the Seamstress since. I haven't even seen the Orator! I can only assume something happened. Perhaps a ritual relating to our Order's goal of 'Paradise'? Maybe something to do with that otherworldy voice I sometimes hear up there? I'm not yet certain...
